tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE favorite_songs (
    song_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    song_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    genre VARCHAR(100),
    release_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE playlist (
  playlist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  playlist_name VARCHAR,
  creator_name VARCHAR,
  creation_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (creator_name) REFERENCES song_details(artist_name)
);

CREATE TABLE song_details (
    song_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    song_title VARCHAR(255),
    artist VARCHAR(255),
    album VARCHAR(255),
    release_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE favorite_songs (
    song_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    artist VARCHAR(255),
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    release_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE playlists (
    playlist_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    playlist_name VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE song_details (
    song_id UUID PRIMARY KEY REFERENCES favorite_songs(song_id),
    duration INT,
    album VARCHAR(100),
    lyrics TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE songs (
    song_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    artist VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    album VARCHAR(50),
    genre VARCHAR(30),
    release_year INT
);
